summary: Provides a comprehensive suite of automated tests that validate the behavior of H.264 video encoding and decoding components, covering context creation, encoding pipelines, buffering, packet formation, bitrate handling, frame processing, bitstream splitting, and end‑to‑end round‑trip integrity across various resolutions.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness, performance, and interoperability of the H.264 codec used in video streaming or recording solutions, enabling early detection of regressions and compliance with quality standards.
